A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I very much enjoyed this film. There is so much attention given to the character development. You see characters change their viewpoints and behavior throughout the film and they even defy your expectations. I felt much more connected with the characters emotionally than in TFA. Also\, the highs in this film are so uplifting and impactful. Two moments in the film\, in particular\, I could not keep myself from tearing up. Not because they were sad\, but because they were magical. Keep up the great work Disney. It’s unfair a studio this corporate can be this original.
